metadata.title: CVE-2021-4098 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient data validation in Mojo in Google Chrome prior to96.0.4664.110 allowed a remote attacker who had compromised the rendererprocess to potentially perform a sandbox escape via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
